trans-unit.source: when green flag clicked set [new month v] to [0] ask [Type in a number betweem 1 and 12 for a month of the year:] and wait set [original month v] to (answer) ask [Enter the number of months to add to the month:] and wait set [months to add v] to (answer) set [new month v] to (((original month) + (months to add)) mod (12)) if <(new month) = [0]> then say (join (join (months to add) (join [ months after ] (item (original month) of [months v] :: list))) [ is December.
]) else say (join (join (join (join (months to add) (join [ months after ] (item (original month) of [months v] :: list))) [ is ]) (item (new month) of [months v] :: list)) [.]) end
